channel.title: Food/potion problem [pi]
channel.description: My server runs fine, and when me and a friend were going to go test out some things we found that food and potions dont work. whenever somebody eats or drinks a potion you get a error that looks like this [code][7/29/12 3:34 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3724 [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickItem.processPacket(ClickItem.java:17) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:139) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:979) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:143)[/code] so sometype of out of bounds expectations. i have no idea what to do, if you need more info jost post, somebody please help!

item.title: Food/potion problem [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

My server runs fine, and when me and a friend were going to go test out some things we found that food and potions dont work.
whenever somebody eats or drinks a potion you get a error that looks like this

[7/29/12 3:34 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3724 [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickItem.processPacket(ClickItem.java:17) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:139) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:979) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) [7/29/12 3:34 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:143)
so sometype of out of bounds expectations.
i have no idea what to do, if you need more info jost post, somebody please help!

Read full topic
